content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5), burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) and chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Furnace group at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to have coal in the inventory before using the burner mining drill
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Make sure to have the required ingredients in the furnace before starting the smelting process
-  Ensure the furnace has enough fuel to operate
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Make sure to have a pipe connected to the steam engine with water
-  Ensure the boiler is working and producing steam
### Errors when using offshore pump but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to have coal in the inventory before using the offshore pump
-  Ensure the offshore pump has enough fuel to operate
### Errors when using lab but having no research in progress
-  Make sure to have a research item in the lab before starting the research process
-  Ensure the lab has enough power to operate
